metadata.title: CVE-2024-37151 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Suricata is a network Intrusion Detection System, Intrusion PreventionSystem and Network Security Monitoring engine.Mishandling of multiple fragmented packets using the same IP ID value canlead to packet reassembly failure, which can lead to policy bypass. Upgradeto 7.0.6 or 6.0.20. When using af-packet, enable `defrag` to reduce thescope of the problem.

criterions.comment: suricata package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
